column4: Hy i have a laptop Fujitsu-Siemens V5515 where i put ubuntu 8.10 with the Modem ZTE MF620.
My problem is that the Modem ZTE MF620 is working perfectly but when i update my ubuntu 8.10 it's stop working, the ubuntu can find the modem but can't establish  the connection to the internet :(
Does anyone know how to restore the inicial configuration of the connection to internet????
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
